name: Travelception
description:
Lore: 

In Travelception you start as a man who lives in the middle of nowhere and one day has to leave his house from the morning until night and when he arrives he sees that his house is fully blocked and he can't enter it, so while he tries to break in he sees someone inside, and to his surprise, IT IS HIMSELF!!!, so he has to enter his house to solve the mystery about the impostor using all available things at his dispose, but at a certain point, YOU START DISSAPEARING!!!, so you need to hurry up and end the life of this impostor (a.k.a. disintegrate it), and when you succesfully do this (or perish in the attempt) *SPOILER* you see once again from the window another impostor, arriving to the house, so you close all the entrances, leading to an infinite loop in the story.

Features: 

- A unique system of editing files in order to solve puzzles and beat the game.

- A (cute) cat (you can feed him) with a Ñ in his thigh (reference to the company name Team Ñ). 

- The house only uses the latest peak of architecture. 

- Also the environment overflows with flora and fauna as its finest with bushes, trees and a cat.

- Lots of items (not really just 4).

===================================

Quick guide if you get stuck (SPOILERS):

- First head to the shed (follow the path that starts at the entrance of the house).

- Grab the hammer and the cat food.

- Feed the cat with the cat food.

- In the file edit the player jump to 20, and change all true statements for false and viceversa.

- Break the garage window with the hammer, enter with the cat, press the button to open the garage, then enter with the human  and grab the key.

- Get the cat and yourself to the terrace and break the window behind the door with the hammer, then enter with the cat through the broken window to press the button.

- From there you can access the previous locked door in the third floor and you will see a clock, put in it 04:20 PM (hint in the file), then cross the door and explore the floor until you get to a door in which you need the key you grabbed earlier, and from there you will gain access to the second floor.

- Explore the floor until you see a window inside it, break it and get with the cat to that place in order to press the button, and also in this floor you will see a note, so you will have to get to the top of some pine to get a key (almost the second closest one to the house), with that key you will be able to access the first floor.

- In the first floor destroy the impostor with your hammer (disintegrate him).

- You won the game.

===================================

Note: andate a la punta del pino, means go to the top of the pine

Also if the game runs your antivirus just trust us the game is not a virus, it is not like we wanna mine cryptocurrencies with your pc or anything like that.

Although we know that the game has bugs, we don't care so don't hate the game in the comments and we're not english natives so also don't hate our home-made translations pls :)

And finally this game was a college project made by a team of four students so don't expect a goty from here (but we honestly think this game deserves the goty), and because of that this game is not going to be updated unless we state otherwise.

We hope that the game has been to your liking and that you have had a good time :D
